thread.section_title: Right Channel Radios Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Right Channel Radios | www.rightchannelradios.com
thread.title: Al C.
thread.title_full: Right Channel Radios reviewed by Al C.

author: Al C.
title: Al C.
text: Kay was extremely hepful when I wanted to add an item to my original order; even sent it without charging additional shipping fees! The instructions were very easy to follow and my CB was setup and operating in only a couple hours! would definitely recommend Right Channel Radios to everyone!
